alert.note: Alert for Hanson; Hutchinson; McCook; Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 6:35PM MDT until August 10 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern McCook County in southeastern South Dakota... Southern Hanson County in southeastern South Dakota... Northwestern Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Hutchinson County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 735 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Milltown, or 12 miles northeast of Parkston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Emery and Clayton around 740 PM CDT. Bridgewater around 750 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
